::Halucigen::
Halucigen tried to pull his tail back but the last part was cut into a
bit before it came back. He tried to fly away but his head was still
sore from the laser shot that nialed it. He kinda flew in a drunken
state. He landed and looked at Hot Rod. He tried to make eye contact
with him so he could convince him that he was thier friend and there
was no need to fight. He had his tail pointed at him with an Explosive
rocket ready to go. Also he ha his lasor pistol in his arm ready to be
armed to his hand and his wings were pointed at Hot Rod ready to fire
another four missiles.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
>
> The tail wrapped his legs, and he triped. He fired 4 mini-rockets to
> intercept the feather rockets. Three were destroyed but one hit him in
> the side of the head.
> "Ohh, head ach."
> He right hand retracted, in its place a saw. He tryed to slice the tail.
